definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
see 沾花惹草[zhan1 hua1 re3 cao3]
to intersperse comic dialogue (as they do in operas)
(Tw) "Yamamoto haircut", similar to a butch cut, but with even length (no tapering on the sides and back), said to be named after Admiral Yamamoto 山本五十六[Shan1 ben3 Wu3 shi2 liu4]
(bird species of China) pied avocet (Recurvirostra avosetta)
to beg while playing the xiao 箫 (mouth organ)/cf Wu Zixu 伍子胥, destitute refugee from Chu 楚, busked in Wu town c. 520 BC, then became a powerful politician
variant of 心拙口笨[xin1 zhuo1 kou3 ben4]

pinyin: ai4 qing2 zheng1 fu2 yi1 qie4

definition: to invite the devil to one's house (idiom)/to introduce a potential source of trouble
impossible to separate/impossible to disentangle/cannot take time out
